meanings.definition: A very large, heavily populated city or urban complex.
meanings.sent1: The megalopolises are bustling with people and tall buildings.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of living in megalopolises like New York City.
meanings.sent3: In the land of megalopolises, even the pigeons seem to have important jobs.
meanings.sent4: The megalopolises are like giant beehives, constantly buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the megalopolises shine brightly, visible from miles away.

meanings.definition: The region in which several large cities and surrounding areas grow together.
meanings.sent1: Driving through the megalopolises, you can see the transition from city to city seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: Urban planners study the development patterns of megalopolises to understand urban sprawl.
meanings.sent3: The megalopolises are like a quilt made of different city patches sewn together.
meanings.sent4: In the megalopolises, it feels like you can walk from one city to another without realizing it.
meanings.sent5: The megalopolises stretch as far as the eye can see, blending into one another like a painting.
